docs.snippet: LEAD: WHITE men receive a greatly disproportionate share of the nation's transplanted kidneys compared with white women and blacks of both sexes, three recent studies have shown....

docs.snippet: LEAD: Only a fierce wind breaking across the rock buttress rising Gibraltar-like from the rolling sea of green hills disturbs the silence of Isandhlwana. Shafts of sunlight break through the afternoon's gathering clouds to bathe a distant ridge....

headline.main: Rorkesdrift Journal; On an Old Battlefield, Zulus Are Given Their Due

docs.snippet: LEAD: The trainer Oscar Barrera broke a personal losing streak extending back to last May 16 when Home by Nine won Aqueduct's ninth race yesterday with Richard Castillo aboard. Barrera had not had a winner among 130 consecutive horses he saddled g...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The trainer Oscar Barrera broke a personal losing streak extending back to last May 16 when Home by Nine won Aqueduct's ninth race yesterday with Richard Castillo aboard. Barrera had not had a winner among 130 consecutive horses he saddled going into yesterday's last race. Jose Martinez, aboard the runner-up, Poster Run, alleged interference by Home by Nine but the claim was disallowed.

docs.snippet: LEAD: The prosecution portrayed Joel B. Steinberg yesterday as the brutal, ''repulsive'' killer of Lisa Steinberg and as a scheming, evasive defendant who tried to conceal her murder with lies and deceit. Failing that, prosecutors said, he blamed ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: The prosecution portrayed Joel B. Steinberg yesterday as the brutal, ''repulsive'' killer of Lisa Steinberg and as a scheming, evasive defendant who tried to conceal her murder with lies and deceit. Failing that, prosecutors said, he blamed Hedda Nussbaum for the death.

headline.main: Prosecution Calls Steinberg A Brutal Killer
